meta.importance: Stop placement determines win rate and account survival

1x_atr.cons: High stop out rate, noise can trigger

1_5x_atr.pros: Balanced - room to breathe, not too wide

2x_atr.use_case: Swing trades, volatile conditions, news days

2_5x_atr.pros: Almost never stopped out on noise

below_swing_low.description: For long trades - stop below recent swing low
below_swing_low.rationale: If swing low breaks, thesis invalid

above_swing_high.description: For short trades - stop above recent swing high
above_swing_high.rationale: If swing high breaks, thesis invalid

below_support.cons: Stop hunting possible at obvious levels
below_support.buffer: 5-8 points minimum to avoid stop hunts

above_resistance.cons: Stop hunting possible at obvious levels
above_resistance.buffer: 5-8 points minimum to avoid stop hunts

beyond_round_number.description: Stop beyond key round number (2600, 2650, etc.)
beyond_round_number.rationale: Round numbers magnetize price - need buffer
beyond_round_number.note: Wider buffer required at major round numbers

time_based_stops.description: Exit if thesis doesn't play out within timeframe

intraday_trades.rationale: If not moving, capital tied up

swing_trades.rationale: Extended time OK but not indefinite

time_based_stops.note: Time stop supplements price stop, not replaces

squeeze_period.rationale: Breakout imminent - need room for expansion

extreme_volatility.alternative: Stay out or trade smaller size

at_obvious_swing_points.description: Exact swing high/low visible to all traders
at_obvious_swing_points.solution: Add 3-8 point buffer beyond obvious level

at_previous_day_levels.reason: Institutional order flow at these levels

at_fibonacci_levels.solution: Don't place stop exactly at fib, add buffer

clustered_stops.description: Where many retail traders have stops
clustered_stops.identification: Clean swing points, round numbers, fibs

stop_hunting_awareness.concept: Market makers sweep obvious stop clusters for liquidity

common_hunts.morning_sweep: Hit stops just before major move

protection.confirm_break: Wait for close beyond level, not just wick

identification.signs: Long wick through level, immediate reversal, low volume spike
identification.trading: When stops hunted, often good entry opposite direction

asia.note: Less stop hunting due to lower volume

atr_trailing.cons: Can give back gains in choppy markets

swing_trailing.method: Move stop to below each new swing low (long)

breakeven_trailing.cons: Often stopped at breakeven for small profit

mental_stops.warning: NEVER use mental stops - must be in market
mental_stops.reality: Mental stops = no stops = account blow up

catastrophic_stops.description: Ultra-wide stop for black swan events
catastrophic_stops.use: Overnight holds to prevent gap catastrophe
catastrophic_stops.note: Not for regular trading, only position insurance

best_practices.place_immediately: Enter stop order simultaneously with entry
best_practices.honor_stop: Never move stop further away (death spiral)
best_practices.review_placement: Check stop makes sense for strategy

common_mistakes.too_tight: Trying to minimize risk, increases stop outs
common_mistakes.at_obvious_level: Placing where everyone else has stops
common_mistakes.too_wide: Stop so wide that risk exceeds account rules
